name: Medieval Arms (itch)
description:
Medieval Arms is inspired by Battlefield 1942.

This game is best described as a single player version of battlefield; instead of playing versus other players in the traditional conquest mode, then you fight versus computer controlled characters. There is no multiplayer, only single player. You can choose from three different classes, each class bring something unique to the experience.

Goal of the game is to hold flags / bases untill you have depleted the enemy forces tickets, and then you win the game.

Controls (Keyboard / Joystick):
Move: WASD / Left stick
Attack: Left mouse button / Right Bumper
Dodge roll: Space bar / B
Block : Right mouse button / Left Bumper
Scoreboard: TAB / Left Trigger
Run: Left Shift / A
Kick: F / Y
Menu: ESC / Start

Audio /graphics / sensitivity settings accessed from main menu and in-game menu.
